common_errors.cause: Executable is not a valid object file format
common_errors.solution: Verify file type: file <binary>. addr2line works on ELF, Mach-O, etc.
Verify executable path. Use -e flag: addr2line -e ./myprogram 0x1234

common_errors.cause: No debug info for address (stripped binary or address outside code)
common_errors.solution: Rebuild with -g flag. Address may be in library - check correct binary specified.

common_errors.cause: Address not found in debug info
common_errors.solution: Verify address is correct. May need to subtract base address for ASLR.
Check file permissions. May need sudo.

common_errors.cause: Debug info is corrupted or in unsupported format
common_errors.solution: Rebuild with current compiler. May be version mismatch in debug format.
Use addr2line on individual .o files or the final linked binary.

common_errors.cause: Binary has no DWARF debug sections
common_errors.solution: Rebuild with -g. Debug info may be in separate .debug file (objcopy --only-keep-debug).

common_errors.cause: Address argument is not valid hex
